duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute human resource strategies in line with organizational objectives and culture.
Lead recruitment efforts for all personnel, from job postings to background checks and new employee orientations.
Manage compensation and benefit schemes to motivate and retain employees.
Oversee employee relations, including conflict resolution, disciplinary actions, and policy development.
Analyze talent gaps and develop targeted programs for talent management and succession planning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
7 to 10 years of experience in human resources or equivalent combination of education and experience
